name: Things To Remember
description:
TW: this game does deal with themes of anxiety, dissociation and panic attacks. 

"Sometimes all I need is just a steady stream of cars. They create a rushing in my ears like coming up for air. The cars are actually fish and I am floating above them. I have climbed inside the words with at least four other people and I am letting them do all the driving."

Things to Remember is a piece of interactive fiction about leaving work to meet a friend and getting waylaid by the weather, both internal and external.

This game was commissioned for Going Down Swinging's 42nd issue, FAKE: https://goingdownswinging.org.au/archives/things-to-remember/
